Changeset.Change: Included declarations for OAI-PMH caches in ehcache configuration file
Support for cross collection search, without the need for selecting schema from the user
Collection name inserted in digital objects for results coming from search
Improved construction of query for abstract fields
Added check in case the generic resource for abstract fields mapping is missing
Added utility for openSearch fields retrieval from query template
Itegrated OpenSearch
Improved AbstractFields query construction
Fixed problem once deselecting all the collections
Added methods to get the results from ResultSetConsumer without transforming them
Fixed bug when selecting collection group for external collections (opensearch)
Several bug fixes in search functionality
Added method and functionality for the counting of results coming from browse
Added logging for openSearch and abstract search types
Refactored for new CM
Changes made in correspondence to changes in query language of Search Service
Added support for browsing distinct fields
Added Search Accounting Info functionality
Fixed bug causing NullPointerException when Multiple collections with different languages are chosen
Changed towards complying with new version of Resource Registry
Bug Fixes
Added Generic Search
Extended the API by adding new functionality
